Class AudioIo

extends Object
    Audio i/o utilities.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  AudioIo.AudioSignal

    • Method Detail

      • saveWavFile

        public static void saveWavFile(String fileName,
               AudioIo.AudioSignal signal,
               int pos,
               int len)
                        throws Exception
        Writes an audio signal into a WAV file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the WAV file.
        signal - The audio signal to be written into the WAV file.
        pos - Position of the first sample (frame) to be written.
        len - Number of samples (frames) to be written.
        Throws:
        Exception
